CustomField.description: Applicable only if Controller Value returns an Integer. Alert will be sent, if (Controller Value > Alert Value and Alert Value Reverse Check = False) or (Controller Value <= Alert Value and Alert Value Reverse Check = True).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Applicable only if Controller Value returns an Integer. Alert will be sent, if (Controller Value > Alert Value and Alert Value Reverse Check = False) or (Controller Value <= Alert Value and Alert Value Reverse Check = True).
CustomField.label: Alert Value
